name: TI_2_1_3_15_System_Maintenance___Codes__Vocabulary__Knowledge__Rules_System_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.3.15 System Maintenance - Codes, Vocabulary, Knowledge, Rules System Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track system maintenance of codes, vocabulary, knowledge and rules.
purpose: Capture system maintenance of codes, vocabulary, knowledge and rules - both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.15#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence of a system maintenance event when codes, classification schemes, knowledge bases, clinical or business practice rules are updated or re-configured.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.15#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.15#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.15#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.15#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.15#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.15#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).
